the senator wanted to change the tax bill .
everyone was silent after he said that .
output.sentences: Our company had a dinner for all of us.
We took time to discuss important topics .
We needed to learn the new changes that are coming our way.
We all took a turn to share our tips in how to make this better.
We all agree that this was a great opportunity to take time and learn more stuff together as a team.
